data.name: Let's MEAT Adam 2
data.detailed_description:
"Inseparable friends, Adam and River, vow to stay in touch once River left to pursue an acting career in LA. When he suddenly goes missing, Adam leaves his small town life to find him.

His trail leads to the most elite gay adult film studio - “MAN-ticore Video” and its suspiciously tight-lipped Director. With no help in sight from police or River's family, naïve Adam opts to go undercover.

But once he's thrown in a cavalcade of monstrous depravity and death, what lengths will Adam go to save his friend? All this culminates to an escape room bloodbath that will drown California in the deepest, darkest red."



  • Play as an all new "Adam", within a brand new story/setting.
  • Unlockable Pinup Gallery. Featuring art from beloved gay/bara artists, like Dizdoodz, Geremy Walker, CaesarCub, Cerealex + more
  • 8 Unique Endings, one being the "True End".
  • Mature 18+ content: NSFW, Strong Language, Blood/Gore, Explicit Sexuality
  • New "Insight" gameplay system. Master it to gain favor with others, and to save yourself from deadly situations.
  • Classic LMA Investigation/Hidden Object gameplay is back...but with a twist.
  • Animated character sprites + partial voice acting
data.about_the_game:
"Inseparable friends, Adam and River, vow to stay in touch once River left to pursue an acting career in LA. When he suddenly goes missing, Adam leaves his small town life to find him.

His trail leads to the most elite gay adult film studio - “MAN-ticore Video” and its suspiciously tight-lipped Director. With no help in sight from police or River's family, naïve Adam opts to go undercover.

But once he's thrown in a cavalcade of monstrous depravity and death, what lengths will Adam go to save his friend? All this culminates to an escape room bloodbath that will drown California in the deepest, darkest red."



  • Play as an all new "Adam", within a brand new story/setting.
  • Unlockable Pinup Gallery. Featuring art from beloved gay/bara artists, like Dizdoodz, Geremy Walker, CaesarCub, Cerealex + more
  • 8 Unique Endings, one being the "True End".

  • New "Insight" gameplay system. Master it to gain favor with others, and to save yourself from deadly situations.
  • Classic LMA Investigation/Hidden Object gameplay is back...but with a twist.
  • Animated character sprites + partial voice acting
data.short_description: LMA2 is a Gay Bara Horror Visual Novel, with murder mystery and puzzle elements; the sequel to 2017's "Let's MEAT Adam".
data.reviews:
“Let’s MEAT Adam 2 is a messy look at purity and porn”
GAYMING MAGAZINE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Let's MEAT Adam 2, is a game for mature audiences only. It contains strong language, and graphic depictions of violence, blood/gore, captivity, nudity and sexual acts.
